website_summaries.verdict: With plenty of pockets for small gardening tools and a few extras, this tote is the perfect companion for puttering about the garden, tending to flower beds, and planting.
pros: Durable 600-denier polycanvas is ideal for outdoor use
Features a roomy inner compartment and multiple side pockets for hand tools, gloves, and water bottle
Sturdy base allows for carrying extras without sagging
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Only has pockets on one side

customer_reviews.title: but that’s a good thing. It holds all of my gardening odds ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit larger than I expected, but that’s a good thing. It holds all of my gardening odds and ends, and seems to be made well. I’m very pleased with the purchase, though I do think it is slightly overpriced. I paid $25, and I think $18-20 would be more appropriate, given the number of other similar totes on amazon at that price point. I needed a green one, though, so I got this. The color is as shown, and the bag stands up well even with nothing inside the main compartment, and with the tools in the side pockets.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of worried what bag I’d actually receive when purchasing this because there were a several similar listings that had varying pictures, and some of the bags looked cheap but this one looked nice. It really is the nice one, exactly as pictured in this listing. The material is canvas, the handles are padded, and each pocket has an elastic cord to help keep the tools secure. It even came with the three tools pictured which I was not expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high wuality.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed for my yard work. I didn't need the tools that came with it but they are very good quality tools which was surprising. Most of the tools included with items such as this are super cheap but these weren't. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney E.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable tote, not as large as I thought. Also it has storage pockets on only one exterior side. My old tote had storage on both sides. I would not buy it again. The included tools are very good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Lady

customer_reviews.title: ... a family member as a Christmas gift and she loved it! It came very nicely packaged and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my a family member as a Christmas gift and she loved it! It came very nicely packaged and the material felt and looked verh sturdy. She loved that it came with a set of very good tools to use in her garden and had a lot of packets to store her other tools in. She's very much looking forward to Spring so she can put this to good use!
customer_reviews.author: BlackKeys

customer_reviews.title: Grandma will be pleased
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. I like the darker color. Won't show dirt in the garden. Lots of pockets for tools, seeds, a flask... No, wait! Sorry! A bottle of water. I bought this for a gift. Grandma will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SAR

customer_reviews.title: Ok item, now collects dust. Not sure if I would rebuy.
customer_reviews.text: Well made item—bigger than expected. Wish it had snap closures on the pockets. Things can fall out... very sturdy canvas material but does not stand up totally on own—not as stiff as picture; accessories are better quality than expected. Don’t use it much after all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It's not as big as I thought, but it is very solid to the touch, and the tools were well packaged. Will update after use...
customer_reviews.author: Aninf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Love this tote. Sturdy, holds all my garden sundries, gloves, seed pacs, apron, extra tools. Comes with nice set of stainless tools.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my goodies and then some. Love the color. The tools that came with this bag aren't really top grade but you shouldn't expect such when you aren't paying all that much for a product.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Page

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mine doesn't stand up like is pictured... actually flops when tools are added
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Green Thumb
customer_reviews.text: I love this tote for my hand tools for gardening and yard work. Keeps them organized and at my fingertips. It is well-made also. The tools included are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: TippySkippy

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after two seasons!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She is happy with it because it is the prefect size to keep all of her stuff organized and together. The exterior pockets are roomy enough for most gardening tools and the center compartment make a great catch all for accessories such as gloves, towels, larger items. The tote is a good size for here need. It canvas is sturdy and well stitched. It has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tobias, Son of Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag with limitations
customer_reviews.text: A good bag but smaller than expected. Doesn’t hold up with the weight of the tools. Also the picture didn’t indicate that there were no pockets on the other side of the bag— and this was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: M. Chaudhery

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic All in one
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this kit everywhere in the garden. it is quite handy for all her needs.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Gronet

customer_reviews.title: good for gardeners
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift and it ended up being better than expected. Material is good and easily washed A lot of room in the bag Tools are in good condition
customer_reviews.author: T-me

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote!
customer_reviews.text: The tote is worth the money I paid for the whole kit. The tools on the other hand are cheap and not really what one would want to use year over year... keep the bag and give the tools to your kids to teach them to garden.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gardening bag I've had. It is sturdy with lots of pockets for tools. And it's really pretty as well so I can leave it out in the open!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gardening made easy
customer_reviews.text: great price..here in 2 days. great quality. fits all my gardening supplies and weed bag in center. Great tote and go for the garden. Everything is in one place.
customer_reviews.author: larrence

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.. This is a gift my granddaughter is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice .. This is a gift my granddaughter is sure to enjoy having
customer_reviews.author: gma

customer_reviews.title: versatile tote
customer_reviews.text: I use it for art supplies (clay tools) and it works very well. The price is reasonable, the quality excellent, and I got some grdening tools to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Astoria Jan

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional Gardening Bag
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my wife. She uses it to work in her garden and then carries it to her mother's house to help with her mother's small garden. My wife loves the bag and the very functional and durable tools that came with it. She likes the deep pockets on either end of the bag to carry her water bottle. My wife tells me that the bag is the right size for the small gardens she tends, and that she frequently receives very favorable comments about the bag from her friends and from friends of her mother.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's great to pack something up! It has enough space!
customer_reviews.author: Rwheels

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Tote
customer_reviews.text: The gardening tote arrived quickly. It is the perfect size for carrying my tools around the garden. I can't wait for Spring so I can use it!
customer_reviews.author: iluvblusky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, good sturdy material. Carries a lot. And it is easy to carry. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gardening Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, my friend loved it. Agree with other reviewers about the quality of the tools.
customer_reviews.author: ittybittycutiekitty

customer_reviews.title: Great Gardening Tote
customer_reviews.text: Great to be able to carry the garden tools I need to the gardens, keeps everything where I can find it. Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: jm46

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bag and the tools are of good quality. I gave this to my mother last year and she was extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JanetE

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The tools are stainless steel, the only kind I purchase, the only tools you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this kit. and the surprise was it had tools with it.
customer_reviews.author: Catbizguy

customer_reviews.title: This tote is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This tote is perfect for my needs, it is durable and constructed very well. The tools that came with it are also well made.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the beginning gardener! The tote is a great carryall for additional items. Tools seem sturdy and the tote is well made.
customer_reviews.author: mkm

customer_reviews.title: kool kc
customer_reviews.text: really nice little flower tote. I keep my fertilizer in it and gloves for deadheading flowers and a little light pruning
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L.

customer_reviews.title: HUNDRED STAR RATING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson who loves gardening. This set will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth St. Michel

customer_reviews.title: Bring on summer!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, spacious and useful place to store and tote gardening tools.
customer_reviews.author: George W. Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: The tools are fine - slightly on the inexpensive side but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: This was a Mother's Day gift. It works... Not much else to say. The tools are fine - slightly on the inexpensive side but not cheap. We have used the set many times with no issues. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas N

customer_reviews.title: Great Carry Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is wonderful for someone who wants to keep many different types of gardening tools with them as they work around the garden. The middle section is great for those misc items such as clippers, mini saw, foam kneelers, water bottle, & more. The size works well because it is not too small so that I can really handle so many items.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny G.

customer_reviews.title: very very happy
customer_reviews.text: large thick bag, positive it will last me many years. first impression of the tools is great, thinking they will hold up great once garden season is in full swing. very happy i chose this set.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey H

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gardeners
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice heavy duty canvas bag. Will make a great gift basket for an avid gardener! The tools appear to be very sturdy, exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: KateLynnM

customer_reviews.title: has everything you need to get started.
customer_reviews.text: this is great, all the essentials to start gardening. can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: bjackiec7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this item. It is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: karen winslow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gardening Tool Tote
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome garden tool tote. I use it daily. It us easy to carry and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Haught

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gifts and were so happy with the response.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice but one of the snaps doesn't work. Not worth returning but I expected it to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Jones

customer_reviews.title: My sister loved it, however
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved it, however, she hasn't used it yet and won't be until spring. So, not sure how usable it is yet.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied - good product
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I expected! Really good product - well made and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this did not get a five star rating is that the pockets were a little to deep for my own personal taste. The gardening tools included were very well made, I was impressed. It really is the perfect bag for any gardener.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Tote for Gardening
customer_reviews.text: The tote is a very strong canvas material and the color is perfect for outdoor gardening. Tools are easy to reach. This is a handy tote to have for back yard gardening.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very pleased with the bag. It is sturdy and so were the tools. Added some seeds, gloves and pruners and it made a fun Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garden Tool Tote
customer_reviews.text: Tote provides the ability to carry ur tools from one area of your garden to another & have access to whatever tool you need to use while doing routine maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Traveln girl

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the quality of the tools and size ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of the tools and size of the bag. Thinking about purchasing more as gifts for the other gardeners in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: great as a bedside book tote!
customer_reviews.text: Not an avid gardener but an avid reader, I use this bag as my bedside book tote, and I love it! It works great as a book tote: it is sturday enough to stand on its own, the sage color looks very pleasant, and the outside pockets are very useful in storing eyeglasses, pens, bookmarks, and my CD player. After putting everything inside this tote, my bedside table looks a lot "organized". Although the outside pockets are a little too deep for pens etc.and I do need to dig in to retrieve them, cannot complain! cuz it is designed for carrying the gardening tools, anyway :-)
customer_reviews.author: once a soldier always a soldier

customer_reviews.title: Picnic at Ascot Eco Gardening Tote with Tool Set
customer_reviews.text: These are much too nice to mess up in yard work - I am using them for my knitting - works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Best tote ever
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this purchase and recomend it totally. It is sturdy, pretty and well done. Best garden tote!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Rodriguez 11255TP0CO

customer_reviews.title: It's great and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: it was a present, and well received. I wish it were a little larger because better to accommodate too much than too little.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Riley

product_meta.title: Picnic at Ascot 341-FO Designed & Assembled in The USA 3 Stainless Steel Tools, One Size, Forest Green
product_meta.description: Our Eco Collection garden tote is made of entirely PVC free fabric. Casual Style defines this durable multi-pocket gardening tote. Set includes three top quality, heavy gauge stainless tools with comfort grip handles. Roomy interior is great for transporting supplies & side pockets have room for a beverage and snack. Designed and Assembled in the USA. Lifetime Warranty.
feature_bullets: LIFETIME WARRANTY from PICNIC at ASCOT USA - Designers and Manufacturers for over 25 years of a Wide Range of High Quality Picnic Baskets, Coolers, Wine Carriers & Life Style Products
HIGH QUALITY multi-pocket garden tote with three heavy gauge stainless steel tools with comfort grip handles.
CONSTRUCTED with durable 600 denier canvas with rolled handles and a rigid base - great for carrying hand tools - seeds - gardening gloves - spray bottle and more
MEASURES 13.5" wide x 6.75" deep x 12" high.
A GREAT GIFT IDEA - Surprise Your Friends and Family - Great for Housewarming, Engagement, Wedding, Anniversary, Retirement, Birthday, Christmas, Holiday, or Hostess Gift!
INCLUDES three stainless hand tools with soft handles that color coordinate with tote.
